00092 FMB_INLINE void body_Initialize(body_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_body){
00093   position_Initialize(body_Get_p_position(p_body)); 
00094   body_Set_value(p_body, 0.0); 
00095   position_Initialize(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)); 
00096   position_Initialize(body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body)); 
00097 }

00100 #define display_body_fields(pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, value, fx, fy, fz, p_speed_vector, f) \
00101   display_body_fields_noSpeedVector(pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, value, fx, fy, fz, f) 
00102 
00103 
00104 /* Too big for inlining (and no need). */
00105 static void display_body_fields_noSpeedVector(COORDINATES_T pos_x,
00106                                               COORDINATES_T pos_y,
00107                                               COORDINATES_T pos_z,
00108                                               VALUES_T value,
00109                                               COORDINATES_T fx,
00110                                               COORDINATES_T fy,
00111                                               COORDINATES_T fz,
00112                                               FILE *f){
00113   fprintf(f, "*** pos= ");
00114   pos_xyz_Display(pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, f, low);
00115   /* Warning: when displaying here the speed vector the SORT_COMMANDE_FORMAT must be modified! */
00116   /*  fprintf(f, "\tspeed=");
00117       position_Display(p_speed_vector, f, high); */
00118   fprintf(f, "\tv= ");
00119   fprintf(f, LOW_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, value);
00120   fprintf(f, "\t\t\t\t\t\tforce= ");
00121   pos_xyz_Display(fx, fy, fz, f, high);
00122   fprintf(f, "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n");
00123 }

00128 FMB_INLINE void body_Display(body_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_body, FILE *f){
00129   display_body_fields(position_Get_x(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
00130                       position_Get_y(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
00131                       position_Get_z(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
00132                       body_Get_value(p_body),
00133                       position_Get_x(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
00134                       position_Get_y(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
00135                       position_Get_z(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
00136                       body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body),
00137                       f);
00138 }
